amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that the Senate should pass a joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution that limits the number of terms a Member of Congress may serve.

action.text: Amendment SA 1488 proposed by Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 1470.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1488, under the order of 2/2/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 24 - 75. Record Vote Number: 11.
